1.content:
At this point, you're somewhat freaking out. You remember being home only moments ago, and now you're in the very show you were watching.

How the heck did this happen? You wonder to yourself. Before we go any farther, you have a choice to make. Are you a...
1.title: Picking Genders

choices: Young, 12 Years old. Wild black hair, blue eyes, pale skin, average.
Mid-Teen, 17 Years old. Spiked brown hair, red eyes, tan, muscular.
11.content: Your dad always told you watching too much television was bad for you. You doubt this is what he meant, but you get the idea now. A though occurs to you then. If you're in a cartoon now, then you've probably changed. You look around for anything that might give off a reflection, and spot a small puddle nearby. Moving to it, you peer into it and see...
11.title: Boy

111.content:
You're younger now, even if only by two years. And you look pretty handsome, as far as cartoon characters go. Grinning, you move around a little, getting a feel for things. Nothing's really different than before, aside from you being smaller. Everything still seems familiar to you too, which is odd. It's as if you've lived here your entire life. You decide it's probably best you head into the city and try and find someone that can help you. Now that I think about it, I've got no where to live... Pushing that thought aside for now, you begin to circle the walls of Konoha, finally coming upon the gate entrance. To your surprise, the guard lets you in without question, giving you a friendly smile to boot. You're completely confused now, it definetely seems like you've been here all your life. But you couldn't have been right?

The city always seemed so cool in the show, and it's even more so in person. The streets are brimming with activity. Vendors are crying their wares, children are running around, busy mothers are hard at work cooking for their loved ones. It's heart warming, seeing the community so closely knit together like this. You begin exploring the city, not caring where you go. After all, you really don't have anywhere to go anyways. You pass over some bridges and start to head into a part of the city you've never seen in the show before. It's a little run-down, almost like a shanty town. You get an uneasy feeling and want to turn back. As you do so, two older men come out of their homes and start coming towards you, they have evil grins on their face. You then realize you have a small sack of money tied to your pants, and they want it. Freightened, you turn around and begin running deeper into the slums, desperately trying to get away from the two men.

You run until you feel like you're going to collapse, it's no use. You recognize the area you are in now, you've been running in circles the entire time. The two men are coming closer now, it's only a matter of time until they get what they're after. Closing your eyes, you tense up and wait for the inevitable to come...Then something unexpected happens. You hear a loud crashing noise, followed by one of the men grunting and another crash. Something's happening, and you're too afraid to open your eyes to see what it is.

"Hey, are you okay?" a voice asks you. Hesitantly, you open your eyes and come face to face with...
111.title: Young, 12 Years old. Wild black hair, blue eyes...

1111.content:
Stunned, you can only nod slowly in response, getting a weird look from Naruto in return. You're now face to face with whom you consider one of your heroes (even if he is a cartoon character.) and you're speechless. He thinks you're scared stiff, and in the typical Naruto-fashion he flicks your forehead to get your attention.

"Hey, are you okay?" he repeats, smiling a little uneasily at you. "What are you doing here, this place is off limits you know!"

"Y-Yeah...Sorry." You stammer out, taking surprise at your new voice. You sound much younger too, apparently puberty has yet to hit this cartoon body. Coming to your senses, you finally take the chance to see what happend a moment ago, and you can't help but smile. Both men are now tied to a light post, their heads slightly swollen from being hit a few times. "Ouch...did you have to be so rough on them?"

"They deserved it. Creeps trying to steal a kids money." Naruto mumbled, looking at them with clear disgust. "Anyways, we gotta get out of here before Iruka-Sensei finds us. He'll go crazy if he sees us here, come on!" Without waiting for a response, he grabs your arm and begins running back towards the entrance of the shanty town. You don't notice at first, but you two are running very fast with little effort. You're glad that cartoons aren't realistic, any human running like this would fall down dead by now. He seems to know the area well, and soon you two are back at the town square.
"What were you thinking going in there like that?" he asks, letting go of your arm and folding his arms across his chest. He's trying to be serious, but you can't help but smile at him.

"I got lost...sorry." You reply in your new voice, still trying to get used to it. "Am I in trouble?"

Naruto's facade ends and his face lights up, he's now the hyperactive ninja you know and love. "Nah, I'm just messing with ya!" he exclaims, slapping you on the back playfully. "Now come on, I think Kakashi-Sensei's got a mission for us!" Eager as always, he starts to walk off without waiting for his company. Do you...
1111.title: Naruto

choices: Do they Speek with the hokage
11111.content: I followed him because I didn’t know my way around Konoha yet even though I was a big fan of show. We then go and speak with Kakashi-Sensei he says “ Naruto who is this kid he is not on team 7 so tell him to get lost”. “ But Kakashi-Sensei he is lost so we must find him a place to stay we need to speek with the hokage”.
11111.title: Follow him.

112.content:
You're definetely older, there's no doubt about it. You've changed quite a bit too, age aside. Your skin has tanned quite a lot even though you've been outside for all of two minutes. Your hair has changed to a lighter brown and is spiked up all over the place, looks a lot like bed-hair. Those aren't what get your attention though. What does is the fact that your eyes are now red. It's a little creepy and you decide to look away. You're in a completely new world, apparently in a new body, and you have no idea what to do. Well, a good place to start would be to head into the village and try and find some help. Following the wall, you soon find the front gates. To your surprise, you spot a familiar face at the gates. It's none other than the somewhat pervy and mysterious Kakashi-Sensei. You're too nervous to approach him, but he sees you and sets his book away in his satchel then starts making his way to you. Sighing, you look down and try to pretend he's not there, which obviously doesn't work.

"Shouldn't you be out doing a mission or something?" he asks in a bored tone, clearly not wanting to be there any more than you are. You look at him slowly and shrug, not too sure what you're supposed to be doing. He closes his eye and shakes his head, mumbling something about 'juveniles' under his breath. "Right...Well, I'm supposed to be on guard duty, but I'll be relieved of it soon anyways. Come with me, we need to find out what squad you're in." Do you...
112.title: Mid-Teen, 17 Years old. Spiked brown hair, red ...

1121.content:
"All right..." you mumble, drooping your head a little as you begin to follow him into the city. You notice your voice is deeper now yet sounds familiar to you. It's a mystery as to why everything seems that way, but it's not something you can try and figure out now. Following him through the city, you finally get to get a good look at the hyperactive ninja's hometown looks like. It's big, much bigger than you expected, and absolutely crowded. There are stalls everywhere, kids running around, people moving about with crates and carts, yet it's oddly welcoming to you. There is a clear sense of hospility in the city, something not known too well in your actual home.

"Did you hear me?" Kakashi asks, breaking your line of thought. You shake your head and blush a little, not having realized you had zoned out like that. He sighs then takes out his book and begins to read it, or look at the pictures, you don't really know what he uses it for. "I asked you what your name is. It'll be easier to find what squad you're in if I have your name."

You start to think to yourself what your name could be. At first, nothing comes to mind. Then you manage to bring it up, not too sure where it came from. Your new name is
1121.title: Agree and follow him.

choices: You aren't from the leaf village just visiting.
I know where to go but thanks anyway
Make your own lie (fine screw my ideas)
1122.content: "What!" you panic and think for a moment you have to make something up. Something believable "No uh wait" What to say?
1122.title: Make up a lie.

choices: a quick way to make cash (poker anyone?)
The way to the hokage. (maybe she can help?)
11221.content: "oh ok i'll show you to the information center that utah get you started." You dont know how but it looks like your on to a good start. it dosn't take long to get to the info center (near the entrance for tourists) "Well here we are enjoy the village". said Kakashi as he turend his attention to his book and walked back to his post. Know that you can lie well when needed but that went... too well you should keep an eye out for Kakashi in the future but for now you turn your attention to the info desk. what should you look for?
11221.title: You aren't from the leaf village just visit...

choices: You go into the village for some clothe
12.content:
You think back to yourself. What happened after you fell asleep. Then you remember the darkness and that bright light. It seems like somehow you were transported in to the naruto world. You start freaking out. How and why did this happen? What should you do? You force yourself to calm down. You look
down at youself and see that your wearing the clothe you had on before you went to sleep. You think that mabey you should get some ninja clothe so you don't stick out, or mabey you should start looking around first. What should you do?
12.title: Girl

choices: keep walking to the hokage tower
121.content:
you start walking towards the gate and you see that there arent any guards. for that you are really grateful for. You really dont want to explain why you are outside the gates wearing strange clothe. You start walking to the market. on the way you reconize many of the faces of the villagers from the show. you can see that some of them are staring at you strangely so you start walking faster towards a clothe store up ahead. you walk in, nod at the owner and walk to the back of the store. you can see alot of ninja clothe you can even see an outfit similar to sakura's. after trying on most of the clothe in the store you find the perfect outfit. the first one was a green shirt that ended at your midrift and a black skirt that had two slits on the side with bandage styled shorts under the skirt. On top of the shirt was a black chuunin styled jacket, and you have on black ninja sandels. ( you had always wanted to try on the sandels.) The green shirt complimented your emerald eyes perfectly. you run a hand through your short black hair. you have to admit you look pretty hot. after you pay for the outfit you start heading to the hokage tower. If you are here then you might as well as become a ninja. imagine all the fun you might to get to have. you might even get to see the naruto gang! speak of the devil and he shall apear. just as you start walking you see team 7 walk by. you quickly run behind a building .

what should you do?
121.title: You go into the village for some clothe

choices: Yes,i think i can do it!
No,i have things to do. (like what?)
1211.content:
You follow Team 7 in amazement."Oh my....its them.For real.....i cant believe it...." You thought. Still following them awing and ohing at them,but they don't notice well Sasuke did. Sasuke finally turns around "What do you want?" You go blank".........." "Let me guess you another fan girl?" Sasuke says. Sakura glares at you. You laughs " Yes im deeply in love with you!" You say sarcastically. Sasuke looks at you rudely"I don't need your sarcasm!" "Sorry.Lets start over Im ______ ______ Its nice to meet you!" You say. Naruto pushes Sasuke out of the way "I'm Uzumaki Naruto Believe it!" He says.
"Trust me I believe you." You say and smile. Sakura moves in front of Naruto "Im Haruno Sakura" She says with a smile. "Im Uchiha Sasuke" He says.
"This is pointless,i already know who they are!" you thought. You see someone walk toward you guys and your eyes widened."Its Kakashi Hatake!" You thought. "Well who is this? You guys we have to go train right?" Kakashi says. "Hi Im ________ ________" You say and cock your head to the right.
"How cute Would you like to train with us?"
1211.title: follow team 7

12111.content:
"Umm... I guess I could?" You hadn't meant for it to sound like a question but it came out as one. Kakashi chuckled "Do you want to train or not?" Sasuke asked looking completley bord which made you seriously agravated "Yes I do want to train. There clear enough?" You fumed. Sasuke just "Hn." and started walking towards the training grounds. Growling under your breathe you followed team 7 to the training grounds.

Once there Kakashi said "Alright today were going to have a ternament. ____ sense your new I'll let you pick who you want to fight."
You hesitated wondering who you should fight. Considering you have absoulutly no training this should be fun...

choices: Choose your own village and name
1212.content:
You decide to keep walking to the hokage tower. You can see them later, but now you need to become a genin. In the forest outside the village you found out that you could use jutsus. You were extremeLy happy, since you memorized many of the hand signs from the show you could now perform jutsus.

When you reach the hokage tower you tell the guard why your there and then head up
to the hokage's office. You can not belive that your going to talk to the hokage. When you reach the door to the office you take a big breath and knock on the door.

"come in."

You open the door and walk into the office. You see an old man wearing a hat. 'so' you think to yourself 'this is the sondaime( third hokage)'

" hello miss how can I help you?" you hear him ask

"um... I w-would like to become a konoha ninja." you ask

" ok, and where are you from and what is your name?"

You quickly search your mind for a village and a name to use.

You call after them and intoduce yourself

"my name is Aoi suzumiya. I am from the mist village, well I actually live in a smaller non-Known

" ok, suzumiya-San, now I need you to preform a couple of jutsu's." the sandiame says.

After preforming the jutsu's used in the genin test you get your very own badge. You cannot believe that you are
now a ninja of konoha.

"congratulation suzumiya-San. You are now a genin of konohagukure. All we have left to do is to place you in a team.
Since all of the avilible genin teams all have 3 members, one will have to have 4 people. Hm, this seems like a good group. Suzumiya-San you
are now the fourth member of team 7 led by Kakashi hatake."

you cannot believe your luck. Not only are you a ninja, but now you are also a part of team 7. After all the official bussines is done, the hokage hands
you a paper that says you are a genin and a part of team 7, and tells you that the rest of your team is at the old bridge. You run all the way across the village to the bridge. You suddenly stop. You see team 7 heading to the bridge. You:
12121.title: The mist village( Aoi

info.brief_description: Make your own decisions and become a character in the world of Naruto.
info.description:
You arrive home after a long day of school, glad to finally have some peace and quiet. Everyone at school had been extremely loud as usual, your home now seemed like a God-Send to you. Even better, your family has gone to visit your grandparents for the weekend, leaving the house to you. After washing up, you head downstairs and collapse on the couch and start channel surfing. You finally come across your favorite cartoon Naruto. It's a new season and you're excited, dinner can wait for now.

The episode is almost half over, and you're almost half asleep. You hadn't realized how tired you were before, it must have crept up on you. Your eyelids begin to close despite your attempts to resist, and soon you're dozing off to sleep. Something doesn't feel right though. As you fall to sleep, you feel as though you are floating through the air. You wake with a start, or at least you think you do, everything is pitch black. You try to speak, but nothing comes out. Your heart starts punding sporadically, you wonder if you're dead. Then, out of nowhere, a bright light blinds you, forcing you to fold your arms over your eyes to protect them. When the light fades, your environment has completely changed. You're in a forest now. You're not sure where, but it seems oddly familiar. It's somewhat open, so you take a look around to try and get a sense of where you are.

No way... You think in disbeleif. You turn around and come face to face with something you have only dreamed of. Standing high above you are the walls of Konoha, an awe-inspiring sight. Thinking it's only a dream, you slowly walk up to the walls and cautiously place your hand on it. It's cold and hard to the touch...It's real! Somehow...you're no longer in the world you once knew. You are now in the world of Naruto.
